trans-unit.source: Represents a view mode that displays data items in columns for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um modo de exibição que exibe os itens de dados em colunas para um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> class and its supporting classes provide the infrastructure to display data items that are specified for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control in a series of columns.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> classe e suas classes de suporte fornecem a infraestrutura para exibir itens de dados que são especificados para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> controle em uma série de colunas.

trans-unit.source: The columns have column headers, which are buttons that are derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, and you can reorder the columns by using drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: As colunas têm cabeçalhos de coluna, que são botões que são derivados de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, e você pode reorganizar as colunas usando operações de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: Note that the columns of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> display data and do not provide direct access to the source of the data.
trans-unit.target: Observe que as colunas de uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> exibir dados e não fornecer acesso direto à fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> as the view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> como o modo de exibição para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> class is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> classe é derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.

trans-unit.source: You can define custom views by inheriting from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase> class that provides the supporting elements for a view.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir modos de exibição personalizados, herdando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase> classe que fornece os elementos de suporte para um modo de exibição.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-a-custom-view-mode-for-a-listview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: criar um modo de exibição personalizado para um ListView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-a-custom-view-mode-for-a-listview.md).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> that uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra um exemplo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> que usa um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: ![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output")
trans-unit.target: ![ListView com saída de GridView](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView com saída de GridView")

trans-unit.source: The columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> are defined as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects.
trans-unit.target: As colunas em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> são definidos como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objetos.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can define <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects as child elements of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], você pode definir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objetos como elementos filho de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: In code, you can add a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property and the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> method that is defined for the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> class.
trans-unit.target: No código, você pode adicionar uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> método definido para o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> classe.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can use other <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> methods such as <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A> to modify the columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, você pode usar outras <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> métodos como <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> e <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A> para modificar as colunas em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define the columns of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir as colunas de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: To style the rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, define a style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o estilo de linhas em uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, defina um estilo para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> controles no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.

trans-unit.source: To add visual elements, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control, to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, use templates or styles.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar elementos visuais, como um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> controlar, como um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, use modelos ou estilos.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Create ListViewItems with a CheckBox](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-listviewitems-with-a-checkbox.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo, consulte [como: criar ListViewItems com uma caixa de seleção](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-listviewitems-with-a-checkbox.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control that implements a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> as its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> controle que implementa um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> como seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The column to add
trans-unit.target: A coluna a ser adicionada

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> object to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: Text string
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de caracteres de texto

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Sem suporte.

trans-unit.source: Text cannot be added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Texto não pode ser adicionado a um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método fará com que uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether columns in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> can be reordered by a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se as colunas em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> podem ser reordenadas por uma operação do tipo "arrastar e soltar".

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if columns can be reordered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as colunas puderem ser reordenadas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier Field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> to clear.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> a ser limpo.

trans-unit.source: Removes all settings, bindings, and styling from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as configurações, associações e estilo de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A> that is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>, in addition to any styling that was applied to it by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método Remove o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A> que está associado com um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>, além de qualquer estilo que foi aplicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollectionProperty" /> attachedproperty.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollectionProperty" /> anexada.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollectionProperty> attachedproperty.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollectionProperty> attachedproperty.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style to apply to column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo a ser aplicado aos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> that is used to define the display properties for column headers.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> que é usado para definir as propriedades de exibição para cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property are both used to define the visual tree for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objects that represent the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> propriedade são usados para definir a árvore visual para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objetos que representam os cabeçalhos de coluna em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A> property can also define column header content when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> is not by specified by defining a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A> propriedade também pode definir o cabeçalho da coluna de conteúdo quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> não for especificado, definindo um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma das várias maneiras de fazer o layout e estilo de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de modelos e estilos de cabeçalho de coluna GridView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define estilos, há algumas restrições.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Estilo e modelagem](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).

trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: Um dos seguintes: `StaticResource`, ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [recursos XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: A chave que identifica o estilo que está sendo solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a um recurso existente em um <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.

trans-unit.source: Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: Sintaxe de elemento de propriedade é tecnicamente possível, mas não é recomendado.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [modelos e estilos in-line](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: Uma associação de referência usando ou também é possível, mas não é comum.

trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu" /> for the column headers in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu" /> dos cabeçalhos de coluna em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma das várias maneiras de fazer o layout e estilo de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de modelos e estilos de cabeçalho de coluna GridView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia de caracteres de composição que especifica como formatar os cabeçalhos de coluna do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> se eles forem exibidos como cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres composta que especifica como formatar os cabeçalhos das colunas a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> se eles são exibidos como cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> estiver definida, essa propriedade será ignorada.

trans-unit.source: You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar várias propriedades para especificar o formato dos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority.
trans-unit.target: Se mais de uma propriedade for definida, o cabeçalho da coluna é formatado com o valor da propriedade que tem a prioridade mais alta.

trans-unit.source: The format for a column can be set on several types.
trans-unit.target: O formato de uma coluna pode ser definido em vários tipos.

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority:
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir mostra as propriedades que podem ser usadas para formatar os cabeçalhos de coluna, ordenados do menor para a prioridade mais alta:

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: Definir propriedades de metadados **true**

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a template to use to display the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um modelo a ser usado para exibir os cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> to use to display the column headers as part of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> para usar para exibir os cabeçalhos de coluna como parte da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property are both set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> propriedade estiver definida, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> propriedade terá precedência.

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma das várias maneiras de fazer o layout e estilo de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de modelos e estilos de cabeçalho de coluna GridView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selector object that provides logic for selecting a template to use for each column header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto de seletor que fornece a lógica para selecionar um modelo a ser usado para cada cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> object that determines the data template to use for each column header.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector" /> objeto que determina o modelo de dados a ser usado para cada cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property, the default logic is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property for all columns if it is defined.
trans-unit.target: Se você não definir essa propriedade, a lógica padrão é usar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> propriedade para todas as colunas, se ele está definido.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property are both set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> propriedade estiver definida, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> propriedade terá precedência.

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma das várias maneiras de fazer o layout e estilo de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de modelos e estilos de cabeçalho de coluna GridView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do elemento propriedade XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: Um dos seguintes: `StaticResource`, ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [recursos XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: A chave que identifica a implementação do seletor que está sendo solicitada.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a uma classe derivada que implementa um práticos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> substituir.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como mapear sua classe personalizada, consulte [Namespaces XAML e o mapeamento de Namespace para WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to the application resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Também por meio de programação, você pode adicionar uma instância do seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> classe como um recurso para o dicionário de recurso do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: A class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> que implementa um práticos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> substituir.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como mapear sua classe personalizada, consulte [Namespaces XAML e o mapeamento de Namespace para WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of a tooltip that appears when the mouse pointer pauses over one of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conteúdo de uma dica de ferramenta exibida quando o ponteiro do mouse pausa em um dos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the content that appears as a tooltip when the mouse pointer is paused over one of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o conteúdo que é exibido como uma dica de ferramenta quando o ponteiro do mouse está em pausa em um dos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default value is not defined.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão não foi definido.

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma das várias maneiras de fazer o layout e estilo de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de modelos e estilos de cabeçalho de coluna GridView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do elemento propriedade XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: A string that becomes the display text for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que se torna o texto exibido para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An object to use as the content for the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto a ser usado como o conteúdo para a dica de ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this object is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or some other element that defines a layout for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>, such as a text element.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse objeto é um <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> ou algum outro elemento que define um layout para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>, como um elemento de texto.

trans-unit.source: In this usage, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> element is implicitly created from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the `toolTipObjectContent` content is set as its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Nesse exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> elemento é implicitamente criado a partir de analisada [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]e o `toolTipObjectContent` o conteúdo está definido como seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <`ToolTip` .../>
trans-unit.target: <`ToolTip` .../>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> objects that is defined for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> definida para esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de colunas no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This property lets you modify the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, by using methods that are inherited from the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> class, such as the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade permite que você modifique as colunas que são definidas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, usando métodos que são herdados a <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> classe, como o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A>, e <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do elemento propriedade XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> elements.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> elementos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> to the columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> by using the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> para as colunas em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> usando o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> método no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the reference for the default style for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a referência para o estilo padrão do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewStyleKey" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewStyleKey" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewStyleKey" /> in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewStyleKey" /> no tema atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> control that implements this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> view.
trans-unit.target: Um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> que implementa essa exibição de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a implementação de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para esse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" /> para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> that is associated with the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> associado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conteúdo da propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" /> of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method to change the columns collection for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Não use esse método para alterar a coleção de colunas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> objeto.

trans-unit.source: To get, set, or change the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter, definir ou alterar as colunas que são definidas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> de objeto, use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style that is defined for each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave que referencia o estilo definido para cada <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> that references the style for each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> que referencia o estilo de cada <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value references the default style for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> control in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão referencia o estilo padrão de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> controle no tema atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style that is defined for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> control that encloses the content that is displayed by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave que referencia o estilo definido para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> que inclui o conteúdo exibido por um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> that references the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> that is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> control for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> que faz referência a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> que é aplicada ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> controlar para uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the style for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> object of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é o estilo para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> objeto de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> no tema atual.

trans-unit.source: You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade somente leitura estática no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] atribuindo seu valor estático para outro valor de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o valor desta propriedade estática define a chave de recurso que é usada para pesquisar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> estilo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: To redefine this style, reference the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewScrollViewerStyleKey%2A> by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of the new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir esse estilo, fazer referência a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewScrollViewerStyleKey%2A> usando o [extensão de marcação X:Static](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) e atribuir esse valor como o [diretiva X:Key](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) do novo <xref:System.Windows.Style>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style that is defined for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave que referencia o estilo definido para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> that references the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> that is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.ResourceKey" /> que faz referência a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> que é aplicada para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the style for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é o estilo para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> no tema atual.

trans-unit.source: You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade somente leitura estática no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] atribuindo seu valor estático para outro valor de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> style.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o valor desta propriedade estática define a chave de recurso que é usada para pesquisar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> estilo.

trans-unit.source: To redefine this style, reference the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewStyleKey%2A> by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of the new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir esse estilo, fazer referência a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewStyleKey%2A> usando o [extensão de marcação X:Static](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) e atribuir esse valor como o [diretiva X:Key](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) do novo <xref:System.Windows.Style>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this read-only property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] as an [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of a <xref:System.Windows.Style> that redefines the <xref:System.Windows.Style> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade somente leitura em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] como um [diretiva X:Key](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) de um <xref:System.Windows.Style> que redefine o <xref:System.Windows.Style> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the reference to the default style for the container of the data items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a referência para o estilo padrão para o contêiner dos itens de dados no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewItemContainerStyleKey" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewItemContainerStyleKey" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewItemContainerStyleKey" /> in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.GridViewItemContainerStyleKey" /> no tema atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> to display.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> a ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: Prepares a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> for display according to the definition of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Prepara um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> para exibição de acordo com a definição deste objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to apply styles, to set data bindings, and to attach a column collection to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser usado para aplicar estilos, para definir associações de dados e para anexar a uma coleção de colunas para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" /> object to assign.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" /> a atribuir.

trans-unit.source: Sets the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Define o conteúdo da propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method to change the columns collection for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Não use esse método para alterar a coleção de colunas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> objeto.

trans-unit.source: To get, set, or change the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter, definir ou alterar as colunas que são definidas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> de objeto, use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The object on which the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" /> is set.
trans-unit.target: O objeto no qual o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" /> está definido.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to serialize the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" /> deve ou não ser serializada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" /> must be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection" /> precisar ser serializado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: O objeto filho a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto filho.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser adicionado ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o conteúdo do texto de um nó ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação de cadeia de caracteres do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the number of columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que indica o número de colunas no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />.
